https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k5HfnMgaREHDNA7CugiETCb9ItM.jpg The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for. Born on the Fourth of July
